item.title: ü¶úüß±SQL Research Assistant Lots of data is locked in SQL tables Most text-to-SQL apps try to convert a user question to a single SQL statement - b...
item.description:
ü¶úüß±SQL Research Assistant

Lots of data is locked in SQL tables

Most text-to-SQL apps try to convert a user question to a single SQL statement - but that often isn't enough for complex questions

‚ùìSo how we enable more complex question answering over SQL tables?

We've‚Ä¶ https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1737177596843208893
